DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Vaccines make gene-modified virus may make body build immune response kill tumor cell . Drugs use chemotherapy , paclitaxel carboplatin , work different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . Radiation therapy use high energy x-rays damage tumor cell . Combining vaccine therapy chemotherapy radiation therapy may kill tumor cell . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study well give vaccine therapy together paclitaxel , carboplatin , radiation therapy work treat patient stage III non-small cell lung cancer remove surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Vaccine Therapy , Chemotherapy , Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Stage III Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer That Can Be Removed With Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine safety feasibility standard paclitaxel , carboplatin , radiotherapy combination vaccinia-CEA-TRICOM vaccine , fowlpox-CEA-TRICOM vaccine , recombinant fowlpox GM-CSF vaccine patient unresectable stage III non-small cell lung cancer . Secondary - Determine clinical response patient treat regimen . - Determine time disease progression overall median survival patient treat regimen . - Determine immunologic response patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This pilot study . - Vaccine : Patients receive vaccinia-CEA-TRICOM vaccine subcutaneously ( SC ) day 0 fowlpox-CEA-TRICOM ( rF-CEA-TRICOM ) vaccine SC day 14 , 29 , 43 , 57 , 70 , 91 , 112 . Patients also receive recombinant fowlpox GM-CSF ( rF-GM-CSF ) vaccine SC vaccination . Patients stable respond disease day 112 continue receive rF-CEA-TRICOM rF-GM-CSF SC every 3 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - Radiotherapy : Patients undergo radiotherapy day 21-25 , 28-32 , 35-39 , 42-46 , 49-53 , 56-60 , 63-67 . - Chemotherapy : Concurrently radiotherapy , patient receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute day 21 , 28 , 35 , 42 , 49 , 56 , 63 . Patients also receive paclitaxel carboplatin day 91 112 ( completion radiotherapy ) . Patients follow annually 15 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 10 patient accrue study within 4-6 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm nonsmall cell lung cancer Stage III ( locally advance ) disease Unresectable disease Carcinoembryonic antigen ( CEA ) positive ( stain ≥ 20 % cell ) tumor immunohistochemistry HLAA2positive No distant metastasis PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 18 Performance status ECOG 01 Life expectancy At least 6 month Hematopoietic Granulocyte count ≥ 1,500/mm^3 Platelet count ≥ 100,000/mm^3 Absolute lymphocyte count ≥ 600/mm^3 Hemoglobin ≥ 10 g/dL Hepatic Bilirubin < 1.5 mg/dL AST ≤ 2 time upper limit normal Hepatitis B C negative Renal Creatinine normal OR Creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min Cardiovascular No unstable newly diagnose angina pectoris No myocardial infarction within past 6 month No New York Heart Association class IIIV congestive heart failure Immunologic HIV negative No alter immune function No active history eczema No atopic dermatitis No autoimmune disease , include follow : Autoimmune neutropenia , thrombocytopenia , hemolytic anemia Systemic lupus erythematosus Sjögren 's syndrome Scleroderma Myasthenia gravis Goodpasture 's syndrome Addison 's disease Hashimoto 's thyroiditis Active Graves ' disease Multiple sclerosis No known history allergy serious reaction prior vaccination vaccina No know allergy egg No active history extensive psoriasis , severe acneiform rash , impetigo , varicella zoster , burn , traumatic pruritic skin condition Other Not pregnant nursing Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception 4 month study participation No history seizures encephalitis Able avoid close household contact follow individual least 3 week vaccinia vaccination : Children 3 year age Pregnant nursing woman Individuals history active eczema eczematoid skin disorder Individuals acute , chronic , exfoliative skin condition ( e.g. , atopic dermatitis , impetigo , burn , varicella zoster , severe acne , open rash wound ) Immunodeficient immunosuppressed individual , include HIVpositive person , disease therapy No active malignancy within past 2 year No concurrent serious illness PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy At least 3 year since prior immunotherapy relate vaccinia fowlpox vaccine At least 3 year since prior antigenspecific peptides No concurrent immunotherapy Chemotherapy No prior paclitaxel carboplatin lung cancer At least 3 year since prior chemotherapy No concurrent chemotherapy Endocrine therapy No concurrent steroid , except follow : Topical steroid Inhaled steroid mild moderate asthma Dexamethasone premedication paclitaxel OR shortterm dos ( 4872 hour duration ) control refractory nausea respond antiemetic Systemic corticosteroid ≥ grade 3 radiation pneumonitis No steroid eyedrops least 3 week vaccinia
